about_the_game:
Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to zombie hordes in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world zombie invasion.

Set in Rome, the eternal city, you’ll be able to explore and play in some of the most unique, iconic and beautiful places of the world, such as the Coliseum, the Imperial Forum, Vatican Saint’s Peter Plaza and many others.

In Undead at Dawn you’ll be facing hordes of hundreds, in most cases thousands, of zombie providing a very fast paced gameplay.
You’ll be able to unlock and collect many different items such as weapons, collectibles and specials. Unlock many different vehicles, to be used in the Endless Run maps, and drive fast in the city streets while killing as many zombies as you can.

Remember....Your mission is to prevent that the cursed zombies will escape the city and infect the rest of the world.

  • 12 maps set in the most beautiful and famous places of Rome
  • 4 weapons
  • 8 (until now) collectibles
  • more than 10 different vehicles to drive on both asphalt and water
  • an original and engaging sound track

Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to zombie hordes in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world zombie invasion.

Set in Rome, the eternal city, you’ll be able to explore and play in some of the most unique, iconic and beautiful places of the world, such as the Coliseum, the Imperial Forum, Vatican Saint’s Peter Plaza and many others.

In Undead at Dawn you’ll be facing hordes of hundreds, in most cases thousands, of zombie providing a very fast paced gameplay.
You’ll be able to unlock and collect many different items such as weapons, collectibles and specials. Unlock many different vehicles, to be used in the Endless Run maps, and drive fast in the city streets while killing as many zombies as you can.

Remember....Your mission is to prevent that the cursed zombies will escape the city and infect the rest of the world.

name: Undead At Dawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to hordes of thousands of zombies, in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world invasion.
